abstract: The legal notices expressed an intent by Jack Kirby’s heirs to regain copyrights to some of the superhero characters he created for Marvel.
snippet: The legal notices expressed an intent by Jack Kirby’s heirs to regain copyrights to some of the superhero characters he created for Marvel.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Walt Disney’s proposed $4 billion acquisition of Marvel Entertainment may come with a headache: newly filed claims challenging Marvel’s long-term rights to some of its superhero characters.

headline.main: Disney Faces Rights Issues Over Marvel
headline.print_headline: Disney Faces Rights Issues Over Marvel

byline.original: By Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes

abstract: Walt Disney’s proposed $4 billion acquisition of Marvel Entertainment may come with a headache: newly filed claims challenging Marvel’s long-term rights to some of its superhero characters.
